title: Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black (Packaging May Vary)
descriptions:
### Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black

**Product Overview:**

Elevate your morning routine with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black. This compact and efficient coffee maker is designed to provide the perfect cup of coffee in under a minute, making it perfect for those who crave convenience and quality in their daily brew.

---

**Key Features:**

- **Brew Sizes:** The K-Compact can brew 6, 8, or 10 ounces of coffee, ensuring you can customize your perfect cup every time.
- **Quick Brew Time:** Experience the convenience of a quick brew time under a minute, allowing you to start your day without waiting.
- **Water Reservoir:** Featuring a 36-ounce water reservoir that is removable for easy filling and maintenance.
- **Smart Start:** Enjoy the convenience of Smart Start, which preheats the water for a hot, fresh cup of coffee when you're ready.
- **Button Controls:** Simple and intuitive button controls make operation a breeze, allowing you to customize your coffee experience effortlessly.
- **Energy Efficient:** The K-Compact is designed to be energy efficient, with an auto-off feature that turns the machine off after 2 hours of inactivity to save energy.
- **Removable Drip Tray:** The drip tray is removable and accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches in height, perfect for on-the-go coffee enthusiasts who prefer larger mugs.
- **Hot Water Dispense:** The K-Compact allows you to dispense hot water as well, making it a versatile option for tea or other beverage preparation.
- **Dimensions:** The coffee maker is 8 inches wide, making it compact and space-saving.
- **Compatibility:** Compatible with K-Cup pods and the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter, ensuring you can enjoy a variety of flavors and blends.

---

**Pricing and Availability:**

Please check our current inventory and pricing. Packaging may vary, so please refer to the product images and descriptions for the most accurate information.

---

**Order Now and Start Your Day Right!**
